comments.author: Dave
comments.body: _Turkey vultures?_ You writing this down, Berly? Actually I guess you needn't feel so bad now for calling Bailey "an insufferable biscuit-whacker." And yes, we had a great ride, thank-you-very-much. Kimberly found Four Mile a pleasant refuge after the hair-raising challenge of exiting Boulder Canyon. On the way down she showed me a few of her trick riding chops. I was especially impressed with the "Mandelbrot kick-out with full-fractal flip." Very visual and very impressive. DU
